algorithm

类 ClusteringAlgorithmSelectionActiveLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.ActiveLearning
      • algorithm.ClusteringBasedActiveLearning
        • algorithm.ClusteringAlgorithmsBasedActiveLearning
          • algorithm.ClusteringAlgorithmSelectionActiveLearning
  • 直接已知子类:
    SpecifiedLabelsAlgorithmSelection

    public class ClusteringAlgorithmSelectionActiveLearning
extends ClusteringAlgorithmsBasedActiveLearning
    Clustering algorithm selection based active learning.

    Author: Fan Min minfanphd@163.com, minfan@swpu.edu.cn
    Copyright: The source code and all documents are open and free. PLEASE keep this header while revising the program.
    Organization: Lab of Machine Learning, Southwest Petroleum University, Chengdu 610500, China.
    Project: The cost-sensitive active learning project.

    Progress: Almost finished, further revision is possible.
    Written time: July 20, 2019.
    Last modify time: July 21, 2019.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ClusteringAlgorithmSelectionActiveLearning

        public ClusteringAlgorithmSelectionActiveLearning(java.lang.String paraFilename,
                                                  int paraDistanceMeasure,
                                                  boolean paraNormalizeData,
                                                  boolean paraDisorderData,
                                                  double paraAdaptiveRatio,
                                                  int paraInstanceSelectionStrategy,
                                                  int paraQueryAmountStrategy,
                                                  double paraNeighborBasedWeight)
        The constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The given file.
        paraDistanceMeasure - The given distance measure in integer.
        paraNormalizeData - Normalize data or not.
        paraAdaptiveRatio - The distance ratio for density computing.
        paraInstanceSelectionStrategy - The instance selection strategy.
        paraDisorderData - Disorder data or not.

      • computeWeightedEntropy

        public double computeWeightedEntropy(int[][] paraBlocks)
        Compute the weighted entropy of the blocks. If one block is empty, the entropy of the block will be numClasses/2. Unknown labels are predicted using 1NN within the block.
        参数:
        paraBlocks - The given blocks.
        返回:
        The weighted entropy.

      • computeWeightedEntropy

        public double computeWeightedEntropy(int[] paraBlock)
        Compute the weighted entropy of the block. Unknown labels are predicted using 1NN.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraQueriedInstances - Which instances are queried in the block. It should be a subset of paraBlock.

      • computeEntropy

        public double computeEntropy(int[][] paraBlocks)
        Compute the entropy of the blocks considering queried instances only. If one block is empty, the entropy of the block will be numClasses/2.
        参数:
        paraBlocks - The given blocks.
        返回:
        The entropy.

      • computeEntropy

        public double computeEntropy(int[] paraBlock)
        Compute the weighted entropy of the block. Unknown labels are predicted using 1NN.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraQueriedInstances - Which instances are queried in the block. It should be a subset of paraBlock.

        The main entrance
